attributes.name: mode
attributes.desc: menu display mode

attributes.name: collapse
attributes.desc: whether the menu is collapsed (available only in vertical mode)

attributes.name: ellipsis
attributes.desc: whether the menu is ellipsis (available only in horizontal mode)

attributes.name: ellipsis-icon ^(2.4.4)
attributes.desc: custom ellipsis icon (available only in horizontal mode and ellipsis is true)

attributes.name: popper-offset ^(2.4.4)
attributes.desc: offset of the popper (effective for all submenus)

attributes.name: default-active
attributes.desc: index of active menu on page load

attributes.name: default-openeds
attributes.desc: array that contains indexes of currently active sub-menus

attributes.name: unique-opened
attributes.desc: whether only one sub-menu can be active

attributes.name: menu-trigger
attributes.desc: how sub-menus are triggered, only works when mode is 'horizontal'

attributes.name: router
attributes.desc: whether vue-router mode is activated. If true, index will be used as 'path' to activate the route action. Use with default-active to set the active item on load.

attributes.name: collapse-transition
attributes.desc: whether to enable the collapse transition

attributes.name: popper-effect ^(2.2.26)
attributes.desc: Tooltip theme, built-in theme: dark / light when menu is collapsed

attributes.name: close-on-click-outside ^(2.4.4)
attributes.desc: optional, whether menu is collapsed when clicking outside

attributes.name: popper-class ^(2.5.0)
attributes.desc: custom class name for all popup menus

attributes.name: show-timeout ^(2.5.0)
attributes.desc: control timeout for all menus before showing

attributes.name: hide-timeout ^(2.5.0)
attributes.desc: control timeout for all menus before hiding

attributes.name: background-color ^(deprecated)
attributes.desc: background color of Menu (hex format) (use --el-menu-bg-color in a style class instead)

attributes.name: text-color ^(deprecated)
attributes.desc: text color of Menu (hex format) ( use --el-menu-text-color in a style class instead)

attributes.name: active-text-color ^(deprecated)
attributes.desc: text color of currently active menu item (hex format) ( use --el-menu-active-color in a style class instead)

attributes.name: persistent ^(2.9.5)
attributes.desc: when menu inactive and persistent is false , dropdown menu will be destroyed

events.name: @select
events.desc: callback function when menu is activated

methods.name: open
methods.desc: open a specific sub-menu, the param is index of the sub-menu to open

methods.name: close
methods.desc: close a specific sub-menu, the param is index of the sub-menu to close
